entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crossgen outerloop regression: Missing unhandled exception header in unhandledTester #109203
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: Variance/Methods/Method002 failing all 12 test cases #109202
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: 2 variance safety test failures in SVM VarianceSafety #109201
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: Failures in GenericContextTest / GenericContextTestDefaultImp #109200
  • [API Proposal]: YAML configuration provider #109199
    Future
  • Very slow access to certain site when IPv6 is enabled #109195
  • System.UnauthorizedAccessException using Directory.GetFiles in user documents folder #109194
  • Analyzer doesn't offer correct fix for missing [DAM] for RuntimeHelpers.GetUninitializedObject #109189
  • WasmImportLinkage is not propagated in LibraryImport #109181
    10.0.0
  • Runtime repo signing is broken inside the VMR #109178
  • Problems when crosscompiling and statically linking openssl and icu #109175
    Future
  • Program hangs on dotnet9 rc2 #109172
    9.0.0
  • [Wasm] Empty struct type ctors should be removed when building with AOT #109170

Closed

  • [S.T.Json] EnumConverterFactory IL3050 when NativeAOT publish with `JsonSerializerIsReflectionEnabledByDefault`=true #109177
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] New failure condition introduced by anonymous mmap implementation #107215
    10.0.0
  • Strange behavior of System.ComponentModel.Int128Converter #109148
  • [API Proposal]: Add static factory for InvalidEnumArgumentException #109099
  • Test failure: NuGet.RestoreEx.targets at "NuGet.NoAllocEnumerateExtensions.OptimisticallyNonAllocatingEnumerable" #107361
  • [NativeAOT] LibraryImport resolves to own exported functions with the same name, even if a custom module name is specified #109150
  • [API Proposal]: Implement IUtf8SpanParsable on IPAddress & IPNetwork #103111
    10.0.0
  • WasmTestOnChrome timeouts in CI #105363
    10.0.0
  • GCHandle.Free should raise errors on misuse #12278
  • How to Cross Compile Linux-arm64 Native Shared Libraries on Ubuntu x64 Platform #109162
  • threading.SleepEx.test2 fails sporadically on CentOs #7056
  • Question:Why we need to check the IsIoPending when the thread pool thread going to exit? #8377
  • Proposal - Incorporate deadlock detection into the CLR. #10335
  • YIELD_WHILE/DangerousNonHostedSpinLockHolder should be modernized #11563
  • GetAssembly of CurrentDomain by Name (AMD Ryzen slowdown) #12621
  • Audit usage of `move register, 0` pattern #33556
  • Backport needed for ARM32 Year 2038 issue fix to .Net 8.x from .Net 9.0 #109161

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix stack overflow in compiler-generated state #109207
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Forward the ForceDryRunSigning variable down to the runtime inner build #109206
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable some red tests for crossgen2 and associate with issue URLs #109204
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add support for building with Clang 19 #109198
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix typo in PackageDownloadAndReference.targets #109197
    needs-area-label
  • Factor LibraryImports into Common\ for System.Diagnostics.EventLog #109196
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Handle UPN name constraints more consistently across platforms #109193
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Security
  • Bump TraceEvent package version #109192
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update `wellknownattributes.h` #109191
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Propagate LCL_ADDRs into natural loops #109190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] GetMethodDescData for jitted methods #109187
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Replace a few SuppressMessage annotations with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #109186
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Sending an extra information with type_load to avoid slowness. #109185
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Cleanup NET8_0_OR_GREATER ifdef in json converters #109176
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add ReferenceHandler to JsonSourceGenerationOptions #109174
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Linux/arm: LSRA resolution issues #109173
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use the SDK support for packaging up PGO data in a way that can be consumed in other projects #109169
    area-Infrastructure, PGO, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Add old x86 JIT GC info spec #109171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Use libclang from dotnet/llvm-project for offsets-tool.py #109188
    area-Build-mono
  • [cdac] Implement `ISOSDacInterface::GetModule` and `IXCLRDataModule::GetFileName` #109133
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] stop using mmap/munmap #108512
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Propagate LCL_ADDRs into handlers #109182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 130.0.6723.58, windows: 130.0.6723.59 #109053
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [main] guard agains empty Accept address #108616
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [cdac] PrecodeStubs and CDacMetadata contracts #109030
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Replace a few SuppressMessage annotations with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #109180
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Bump Android devcontainer from Jammy to Noble #109153
    area-Meta, os-android
  • [LoongArch64] Sync with PR#107282: Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks. #109102
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Avoiding discarding exception details of `MissingMethodException` in `RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl` #108876
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Block `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.TelemetryTest` with `EnableAggressiveTrimming && Scenario=WasmTestOnChrome` #109179
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Expose additional JIT metrics #109035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move `Intrinsic` generation to use the transient code gen for `CopyConstruct`. #109129
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Set InstructionSet_EVEX flag in altjit. #108534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace Delegate MethodInfo cache with the MethodDesc #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fold null checks against known non-null values #109164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ILASM] Revive #85344 #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Disable user mapper for SslStream on Windows (TLS 1.3) (#100833) #109116
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    arch-arm32, arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr
  • Split the HostApplicationBuilder configuration. #107616
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Use properties for some [GeneratedRegex]s #109118
    area-Meta
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Bump serialize-javascript #108883
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 8.0.12
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109143
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • [browser] fix 4GB JS interop #109079
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Opt `emitLoadImmediate` #109062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Fix SortedSet.IsSubsetOf (and friends) 102118 #102249
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for generic span casting #109136
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • Give unique event ID to TRANSACTION_CREATED_OLETX_EVENTID #109138
    area-System.Transactions, community-contribution
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • FileShare change to ReadWrite #109104
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Exit with quick_exit when using debug UCRT #109006
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
